key_insights: Customers rate music and classes as merely average/satisfactory, indicating low enthusiasm.
recommendation: Improve class programming and curate energizing playlists using member surveys and periodic instructor development.
justification: Targeted upgrades to classes and music will convert neutral feedback into higher engagement and retention.

key_insights: Members report crowding and hygiene concerns around sanitizer stations.
recommendation: Add more sanitizer dispensers at multiple locations, use signage to disperse use, and increase visible cleaning frequency.
justification: Reducing bottlenecks and increasing visible sanitation will reassure members and lower perceived infection risk.

key_insights: Shower areas are consistently reported as crowded, causing frustration and wait times.
recommendation: Manage shower occupancy with peak-hour staffing and signage, and evaluate adding stalls or extending locker-room access times.
justification: Reducing shower congestion will decrease wait times and improve overall member satisfaction.

key_insights: Members consistently report the air conditioning is inadequate and could be improved.
recommendation: Conduct an HVAC inspection, adjust setpoints and maintenance schedules, and optimize ventilation for comfort.
justification: Resolving climate-control issues directly addresses comfort complaints and reduces a common churn driver.

key_insights: Members feel the gym is crowded and that staff assistance during busy periods is insufficient.
recommendation: Increase floor staff during peak hours, enforce capacity controls, and deploy staff to manage equipment flow.
justification: More visible staff and capacity management will alleviate congestion and improve perceived service quality.
